thread.section_title: Upperwine Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Upperwine | upperwine.com
thread.title: Rachel B.

author: Rachel B.
title: Rachel B.
text:
I have been ordering from Upperwine for over three years. They have a great selection of wines, in both the regular catalogue and the frequent special offers. Wines are well-described and have always lived up to expectation - and prices are reasonable for this quality of wine. Delivery is quick - usually within two days - although you can arrange for a later delivery if it more convenient.
Great wine company - I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them.
